casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Carlton Washington TOMLINSON. No. 61P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Tomlinson, Carlton Washington. Matthew Liles, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Robert A. Evans, Jr., District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of February 2016 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."
